p: Significance of fixed effects (plant nativity and season) was assessed with the “ANOVA” command of the “car” package. Multiple comparison of means for differences between seasons was analyzed using Tukey's post hoc tests (“glht” function, “multcomp” package (Hothorn et al., 2008)). To finally assess the overall variance explained by models, we calculated R 2 ‐values with the pseudo‐R‐squared (“r.squaredGLMM”) function of the “MuMIn” package (Bartoń, 2018).
